ПЕРЕВАГИ_СТВОРЕННЯ_САЙТУ_НА_WORDPRESS: Benefits of creating a WordPress website
СЬОГОДНІ_WORDPRESS_Є_ОДНІЄЮ_З_НАЙПОПУЛЯР: Today, WordPress is one of the most popular platforms for creating websites. It is chosen by millions of users around the world due to its convenience, flexibility, and wide functionality. The main advantages of creating a website on WordPress, especially if you use proven plugins, are as follows:
SEO_—_ОДИН_З_НАЙВАЖЛИВІШИХ_ФАКТОРІВ_УСПІ: SEO is one of the most important factors in a website’s success. The Yoast SEO plugin helps you set up optimal SEO settings by creating meta tags, XML sitemaps, optimizing content structure, and providing recommendations for improving search visibility. This will help your website rank better in search engines.
КОНТРОЛЬ_БИТИХ_ПОСИЛАНЬ_З_BROKEN_LINK_CH: Check for broken links with Broken Link Checker
БИТІ_ПОСИЛАННЯ_НЕГАТИВНО_ВПЛИВАЮТЬ_НА_КО: Broken links negatively impact user experience and SEO. The Broken Link Checker plugin automatically scans your site and detects broken links, helping you fix errors in a timely manner and keeping your site in good condition.
КОНТАКТНІ_ФОРМИ_—_ЦЕ_ВАЖЛИВИЙ_ЕЛЕМЕНТ_ВЗ: Contact forms are an essential part of your website’s customer experience. WPForms makes it easy to create user-friendly, customizable forms, providing a simple way to connect with your customers without the need for coding.
ШВИДКІСТЬ_ЗАВАНТАЖЕННЯ_САЙТУ_БЕЗПОСЕРЕДН: Site loading speed directly impacts behavioral factors and SEO. The LiteSpeed ​​Cache plugin helps significantly speed up your site with page caching, image optimization, and other performance-enhancing tools.
ІНТЕГРАЦІЯ_З_СОЦІАЛЬНИМИ_МЕРЕЖАМИ_ЗА_ДОП: Social media integration with Smash Balloon Social Post Feed
СОЦІАЛЬНІ_МЕРЕЖІ_ВІДІГРАЮТЬ_ВАЖЛИВУ_РОЛЬ: Social media plays an important role in audience engagement. The Smash Balloon Social Post Feed plugin allows you to display a Facebook feed on your website, increasing user engagement and expanding content reach.
АНАЛІТИКА_ТА_ВІДСТЕЖЕННЯ_ТРАФІКУ_З_GOOGL: Analytics and traffic tracking with Google Analytics
АНАЛІЗ_ВІДВІДУВАНОСТІ_—_ЦЕ_КЛЮЧ_ДО_УСПІШ: Traffic analysis is key to successful website development. The Google Analytics plugin allows you to track user behavior, traffic sources, and other important metrics, helping you optimize your marketing strategy.
WORDPRESS_НАДАЄ_ПОТУЖНИЙ_ФУНКЦІОНАЛ_ДЛЯ_: WordPress provides powerful functionality for creating modern websites, and the right choice of plugins makes the platform even more convenient and efficient. Using tools for SEO, broken link control, feedback forms, caching, social media integration and analytics, you will get not only a beautiful, but also a functional website, ready for growth and development.
ХОРОШОП_—_ЦЕ_СУЧАСНА_UKRAINE_ПЛАТФОРМА_Т: Platforms for creating online stores are very convenient, but not free. Prices range from $10 to $1,200 per month. That is almost $15,000 per year.
